description: Colby Tucker's new assistant Jake Porter may not be an incredible asset to the office culture, but the view he provides when he's bending over backwards for the boss makes him more than worth retaining. However, the sexy bearded Colby can't shake the feeling that he's seen Jake somewhere before. Jake crawls under his boss' desk and gives him a deep and intense blowjob, taking Colby's thick cock all the way down his throat. Colby pulls Jake up onto his desk, spreads his legs and gives him a plowing that will have the typing pool talking for weeks.
title: My Assistant the Porn Star: Bareback
